alert.note: Alert for Sabine; San Augustine (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 10:23PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Natchitoches and central Sabine Parishes, southeastern San Augustine and Sabine Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1022 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Natchitoches to near Many to Hemphill to 11 miles north of Ebenezer. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Milam, Many, Hemphill, Pineland, Montgomery, Browndell, Allen, Florien, Provencal, Natchez, Fisher, Robeline, Kisatchie, Cloutierville, Melrose, Bellwood, McElroy, Yellowpine and Marthaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
